required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Observational Study on Dual And Triple Therapies Based on Peginterferon Alfa (e.g. Pegasys) in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
clinical_study.official_title: Non-Interventional Cohort Study on the Utilization and Impact of Dual and Triple Therapies Based on Pegylated Interferon for the Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis C

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective, multicenter, observational cohort study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of peginterferon alfa (e.g. Pegasys) plus ribavirin and treatment regimens containing direct-acting antivirals in patients with chronic hepatitis C who are treatment-naïve or treatment-experienced and HIV HCV co-infected. Data will be collected from patients receiving treatment according to current Summary of Product Characteristics and local labeling for the duration of their treatment and a 24-week follow-up.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Sustained virological response rate, defined as percentage of patients with HCV RNA <50 IU/mL at 24 weeks past completion of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Virological response (in correlation with on-treatment factors)
Percentage of patients treated according to label / Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC)
Sustained virological response in correlation with dose reductions/treatment interruptions
Treatment (drugs, regimen) in relation to medical history/concomitant medical conditions
Incidence of viral rebound on DAA based triple therapy

study_pop.textblock: Chronic hepatitis C patients (naïve or treatment experienced and HIV HCV co-infected) receiving combination therapy with pegylated interferons plus ribavirin or treatment regimens containing direct-acting antivirals

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult (according to local legislation) patients
- Chronic hepatitis C (HCV)
- Naïve or treatment experienced and HIV HCV co-infected
- Receiving treatment for HCV with pegylated interferons plus ribavirin or regimens containing direct-acting antivirals (DAA) according to standard of care and in line with current SPC/local labeling
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindications according to SPC/local labeling
- Treatment started >4 weeks before entering study

address.country: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of

location_countries.country: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of
